amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Earned Income Tax Credit precertification program and increase funding by $75 million for the investigation and audit of large and mid-size corporations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make adjustments in the account for Tax Law Enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cooper amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 219 (Roll no. 475).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Cooper.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cooper amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 219 (Roll no. 475).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
